description: Retrieves a list of all attributes associated with a specific migration task.

parameters.name: MigrationTaskName
parameters.description: The identifier given to the MigrationTask. Do not store personal data in this field.

nested_items.name: MigrationTask
nested_items.description: Object encapsulating information about the migration task.

nested_items.name: ProgressUpdateStream
nested_items.description: A name that identifies the vendor of the migration tool being used.

nested_items.name: MigrationTaskName
nested_items.description: Unique identifier that references the migration task. Do not store personal data in this field.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the task - Not Started, In-Progress, Complete.

nested_items.name: StatusDetail
nested_items.description: Details of task status as notified by a migration tool. A tool might use this field to provide clarifying information about the status that is unique to that tool or that explains an error state.

nested_items.name: ProgressPercent
nested_items.description: Indication of the percentage completion of the task.

nested_items.name: UpdateDateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the task was gathered.

nested_items.name: ResourceAttributeList
nested_items.description: Information about the resource that is being migrated. This data will be used to map the task to a resource in the Application Discovery Service repository.
